article_title: Siskin to acquire St. Barnabas; Chattanooga nursing facility will make hospital a 'one stop shop'

article_metadata.description: Siskin Hospital for Physical Rehabilitation and St. Barnabas Healthcare Center have long been linked by a bridge and a parking lot.
